front.title: Erasure Encoding of Files in NFSv4.2

abstract.t: Parallel NFS (pNFS) allows a separation between the metadata (onto a metadata server) and data (onto a storage device) for a file. The Flexible File Version 2 Layout Type is defined in this document as an extension to pNFS that allows the use of storage devices that require only a limited degree of interaction with the metadata server and use already-existing protocols. Data replication is also added to provide integrity.
